column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had the bacon wrapped dates
column6: and of course plenty more. Everything was so good
column7: came out promptly and hot (a big thing of mine) and our server was very attentive and friendly
column8: yet not overly so. We did have a reservation but apparently on weekends this place gets really crowded so we did have to wait maybe 5-10 minutes for our table. Since then though we have never had to wait for a table and always had great service!
